short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily open Amazon product page links in Backpack.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When browsing any product page in Amazon, click on backpack toolbar icon to open current product (in Backpack).

Open Source!
Visit the website link to access source code :)
